title: A Voyage round Great Britain; with short views of Aberdeen, Balmoral, ... Fécamp, Havre and Paris
author: Hargreaves, Thomas
snippet: There are manybays or indents in the coast with heads projecting farout, and these, with a gale blowing from the east, aresometimes very difficult to escape. The lights areSt. Abb's Head, Fern and Longstone near together,Coquet Island, Tynemouth and Souter Head, Seaham and West Hartlepool, Whitby, Scarborough, andFlamborough Head, all being leading lights.

title: The Edinburgh gazetteer, or geographical dictionary ...
snippet: Longsiuen, the name of two towns inChina, of the third rank, in Kiangsee andTchekiang. Longstone, Great and Little, twoadjacent townships in England, county ofDerby, 3 miles N. W. from Bakewell. Porpulation 631.
